sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.cms" name="Content Management" state="published" licensable="true" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" afterload="install_cms_types_and_demo.js" type="application" help="Content_Management_Plugin" cache_flush="true">
<description>The Content Management application allows administrators to create custom, branded, web front ends on top of their existing ServiceNow instance</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glideapp.home"/> <import plugin="com.glide.text_search" /> <import plugin="com.glide.db_images" /> </requires>
<extension point="com.glide.page.header" name="content_header.xml" class="" /> <extension point="com.glide.page.title" name="content_title.xml" class=""/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="content_summarizer" class="com.glide.cms.ContentSummarizerTag"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="content_inline_grid" class="com.glide.cms.InlineGridTag"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="content_inline_dropzone" class="com.glide.cms.DropZoneTag"/> <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="content_block" class="com.glide.cms.BlockTag"/>
<extension point="com.glide.ui.virtual_host" name="cms" class="com.glide.cms.CMSSiteProvider" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.login_redirect" name="cmslogin" class="com.glide.cms.ContentLoginRedirect" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.content_provider" name="cssdb" class="com.glide.cms.CSSDBContentProvider" />
<extension point="com.glide.cms" name="newDashboardID" class="com.snc.canvas.EmailNewDashboardGenerator" />
<extension point="com.glide.notification.token" name="CMS_URI+" class="com.glide.cms.CMSEmailLink" /> </plugin>
]]></definition> <description>The Content Management application allows administrators to create custom, branded, web front ends on top of their existing ServiceNow instance</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Content_Management_Plugin</help> <id>com.glide.cms</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Content Management</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.cms/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glideapp.home,com.glide.text_search,com.glide.db_images</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.cms</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
